name: sensetype-ai
title: SenseType AI
description: AI-powered input engine that senses your intent and transforms your typing
author: thomas

commands.name: index
commands.title: SenseType AI
commands.subtitle: Transform your text
commands.description: AI-powered text transformation with real-time feedback

preferences.name: openrouterApiKey
preferences.title: OpenRouter API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenRouter API key for accessing AI models

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Model
preferences.description: The AI model to use for text transformation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
